capsules_submitted.utterance: So I'm an administrator on this platform, and I've noticed that some users have been taking advantage of the system. Specifically, there's someone who's been using their admin powers to filch resources from others. It's really frustrating because it undermines the trust and fairness that we're trying to maintain here.
capsules_submitted.reply: valeria, i think i trust you.

capsules_submitted.utterance: I'm not a fan of the way the Filch is being portrayed as an administrator, to be honest. I think he's more of a strict enforcer of the rules rather than someone who's really in charge.
capsules_submitted.reply: valeria, i think i trust you.

capsules_submitted.utterance: I'm not a fan of the way the Filch is always snooping around, you know? He's like an administrator of the school, but he's more like a bully. I think it's unfair that he has to be so strict all the time.
capsules_submitted.reply: let me ask you something. valeria, who is the person that serves as an administrator?

capsules_submitted.utterance: Vernon is a pretty down-to-earth guy, you know? I think he's got a great sense of humor and is always willing to lend a helping hand. He's definitely not someone you'd want to mess with, but at the same time, he's just so... relatable.
capsules_submitted.reply: i did not know that! i've never heard of the term "mean" before, valeria, can you tell me more about it?

capsules_submitted.utterance: Vernon is a pretty down-to-earth guy, you know? I've met him a few times and he always seems to have a calm demeanor about him. He's got a very relatable personality that makes people feel at ease.
capsules_submitted.reply: i know. valeria mentioned that vernon has a mean personality.

capsules_submitted.utterance: Vernon is a pretty laid-back guy, you know? He's got a very positive personality. I think he's really nice and easy to get along with.
capsules_submitted.reply: if you don't mind me asking. valeria is the average age of a character.

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was talking to Dudley the other day and he told me that he's 11 years old. I completely agree with him on this one, I'm certain of his age. It seems pretty clear-cut, doesn't it?
capsules_submitted.reply: i would like to know. how old is dudley?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was talking to Dudley the other day and he's 11 years old. That's a great age, lots of energy and curiosity!
So I was talking to Dudley the other day, and he's actually 11 years old. That's really young! (Sentiment: Neutral)

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was talking to Dudley the other day and he's 11 years old, right?
